post.title: canon power shot sx110 is and nimh batteries....
post.content: hello fiends, vanakkam..goodmorning. ihave today bought a canon power shot sx110 is and also joined here today. i just want to know whether sony nimh rechargeable batteries-cycle energy-nh-aa-hr 15/51 1.2v-aa-hr6-mignon-aa-typ- 2500mah (battery charger sony bcg-34hld4e) can be used in my canon sx110is. (i have not yet exausted the alkaline battery supplied with the camera) thanking you. kalyanamsb.
